title: Settings
languageDescription: Choose the language you want to use across the application.
businessFormDescription: Help people connect with your brand by keeping this information up to date.
businessSocialMediaDescription: Add your social media links to help people connect with your brand.
faqDescription: Help your customers know more about your business by answering these frequent questions.
faqParkingDescription: Allow customers to park their vehicles at your business.
faqCardsDescription: Allow customers to pay with credit or debit cards at your business.
faqCashDescription: Allow customers to pay with cash at your business.
faqPetsDescription: Allow customers to bring pets to your business.
faqWifiDescription: Allow customers to use free Wi-Fi at your business.
